channel.title: Increasing NPC drops
channel.description: I am using npcdrops.cfg for my drops system, and I want to add some drops to my monsters, unfortunately, as soon as I top 15 drops per monster, the server won't take it. What can I do to sort this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2009, 08:18:12 am[/size][hr]PLEASE SOMEONE HELP!
